languages.text: "Да помилуйте, уважаем{mf|ый|ая}..." {n}Стражница едва не плачет.{/n} "Да разве мы гвардейцы обученные? Мы из сопровождения экспедиционного — уже которое поколение здесь живем, до того Бог-Император уберегал от напастей, а теперь приходится воевать. Народ выживший, конечно, в штольне собрали, оружие, какое есть раздали... да разве помогает оно от этих живодеров, коли мы сами не всегда знаем, как с этим оружием обращаться!"

traits.locale_text: "Да помилуйте, уважаем{mf|ый|ая}..." {n}Стражница едва не плачет.{/n} "Да разве мы гвардейцы обученные? Мы из сопровождения экспедиционного — уже которое поколение здесь живем, до того Бог-Император уберегал от напастей, а теперь приходится воевать... только не обучены мы. Народ выживший, конечно, в штольне собрали, оружие, какое есть раздали... да разве помогает оно от этих живодеров, коли мы сами не всегда знаем, как с этим оружием обращаться!"

languages.text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"
languages.original_text: "Да помилуйте, уважаем{mf|ый|ая}..." {n}Стражница едва не плачет.{/n} "Да разве мы гвардейцы обученные? Мы из сопровождения экспедиционного — уже которое поколение здесь живем, до того Бог-Император уберегал от напастей, а теперь приходится воевать. Народ выживший, конечно, в штольне собрали, оружие, какое есть раздали... да разве помогает оно от этих живодеров, коли мы сами не всегда знаем, как с этим оружием обращаться!"

We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

"Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

languages.text: “拜托了，大人……”{n}这个哨兵都快急哭了。{/n}“你以为我们是训练有素的帝国卫队吗？我们是考察队的人，我们一直都生活在这里。神皇也一直守护着我们，让我们免遭厄运。可现在，我们不得不战斗。所有幸存者都聚集在这条隧道里，我们所有的武器都已经发给他们了……可我们自己都不知道那些武器该怎么用，我们该怎么对付那群屠戮成性的杀人狂？”
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

traits.locale_text: “拜托了，大人……”{n}这个哨兵都快急哭了。{/n}“你以为我们是训练有素的帝国卫队吗？我们是考察队的人，我们一直都生活在这里。神皇也一直守护着我们，让我们免遭厄运。可现在，我们不得不战斗。所有幸存者都聚集在这条隧道里，我们所有的武器都已经发给他们了……可我们自己都不知道那些武器该怎么用，我们该怎么对付那群屠戮成性的杀人狂？”

languages.text: «Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}La guardia está al borde de las lágrimas.{/n} «¿Cree que somos soldados entrenados de la Guardia? Somos parte de un convoy de expedición. Hemos vivido aquí durante generaciones y, hasta ahora, el Dios Emperador nos había protegido de la desgracia... y esta vez tenemos que luchar. Los supervivientes se han fortificado en el túnel, hemos repartido las armas que tenemos... pero ¿de qué nos sirven contra esos salvajes si apenas sabemos usarlas?».
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

traits.locale_text: «Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}La guardia está al borde de las lágrimas.{/n} «¿Cree que somos soldados entrenados de la Guardia? Somos parte de un convoy de expedición. Hemos vivido aquí durante generaciones y, hasta ahora, el Dios Emperador nos había protegido de la desgracia... y esta vez tenemos que luchar. Los supervivientes se han fortificado en el túnel, hemos repartido las armas que tenemos... pero ¿de qué nos sirven contra esos salvajes si apenas sabemos usarlas?».

languages.text: 「お願いです、陛下…」{n}見張りは今にも泣きそうになっている。{/n}「私たちが訓練された近衛兵だと思いますか？私たちは遠征隊の一員です。私たちは何世代にもわたってここに住んでおり、これまで神帝陛下が私たちを不幸から守ってくれました。しかし、今、私たちは戦わなければなりません。生存者は 全員がトンネルに集まり、私たちが持っている武器を配った…しかし、私たちが武器の使い方を知らなければ、敵とどう戦えというのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

traits.locale_text: 「お願いです、陛下…」{n}見張りは今にも泣きそうになっている。{/n}「私たちが訓練された近衛兵だと思いますか？私たちは遠征隊の一員です。私たちは何世代にもわたってここに住んでおり、これまで神帝陛下が私たちを不幸から守ってくれました。しかし、今、私たちは戦わなければなりません。生存者は 全員がトンネルに集まり、私たちが持っている武器を配った…しかし、私たちが武器の使い方を知らなければ、敵とどう戦えというのですか？」

languages.text: {n}La sentinelle est à deux doigts de fondre en larmes.{/n}« Je vous en prie, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}... Vous pensez que nous sommes des gardes formés au combat ? Nous faisions partie du convoi d'expédition. Nous vivons ici depuis des générations et, jusqu'à maintenant, l'Empereur-Dieu nous protégeait des malheurs. Mais nous devons nous battre, à présent. Les survivants se sont rassemblés dans le tunnel, nous avons distribué les armes à notre disposition... mais comment sont-elles censées nous aider à lutter contre ces monstres alors que nous savons à peine nous en servir ? »
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sentinelle est à deux doigts de fondre en larmes.{/n}« Je vous en prie, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}... Vous pensez que nous sommes des gardes formés au combat ? Nous faisions partie du convoi d'expédition. Nous vivons ici depuis des générations et, jusqu'à maintenant, l'Empereur-Dieu nous protégeait des malheurs. Mais nous devons nous battre, à présent. Les survivants se sont rassemblés dans le tunnel, nous avons distribué les armes à notre disposition... mais comment sont-elles censées nous aider à lutter contre ces monstres alors que nous savons à peine nous en servir ? »

languages.text: "Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Die Wache ist kurz davor, in Tränen auszubrechen.{/n} "Meint Ihr, wir wären ausgebildete Wachen? Wir gehören zum Expeditionskonvoi – wir leben schon seit Generationen hier, und bisher hat uns der Gottimperator immer vor Unglück bewahrt. Doch jetzt müssen wir kämpfen. Die Überlebenden haben sich alle im Tunnel versammelt, wir haben die verfügbaren Waffen ausgegeben ... aber wie soll uns das gegen diese Schlachter helfen, wenn wir nicht einmal wissen, wie man richtig mit den Waffen umgeht?"
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? We're from the expedition convoy — we've lived here for generations and, up to now, the God-Emperor has guarded us from misfortune. But now we have to fight. The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

traits.locale_text: "Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Die Wache ist kurz davor, in Tränen auszubrechen.{/n} "Meint Ihr, wir wären ausgebildete Wachen? Wir gehören zum Expeditionskonvoi – wir leben schon seit Generationen hier, und bisher hat uns der Gottimperator immer vor Unglück bewahrt. Doch jetzt müssen wir kämpfen. Die Überlebenden haben sich alle im Tunnel versammelt, wir haben die verfügbaren Waffen ausgegeben ... aber wie soll uns das gegen diese Schlachter helfen, wenn wir nicht einmal wissen, wie man richtig mit den Waffen umgeht?"

languages.text: "Lütfen {mf|lordum|leydim}." {n}Nöbetçi gözyaşlarına boğulmak üzere.{/n} "Bizim eğitimli Muhafızlar olduğumuzu mu düşünüyorsunuz? Biz keşif konvoyundanız, nesillerdir burada yaşıyoruz ve şimdiye kadar Tanrı İmparator bizi badirelere karşı korudu. Şu an savaşmak zorundayız ama. Hayatta kalanların hepsi tünelde toplandı, sahip olduğumuz silahları onlara dağıttık ancak onları nasıl kullanacağımızı bile her zaman bilemezken bu kasaplara karşı silahlarımız ne işe yarayacak ki?"
languages.original_text: "Please, my {mf|lord|lady}..." {n}The sentry is on the verge of tears.{/n} "Do you think we are trained Guardsmen? The survivors have all gathered in the tunnel, we've handed out what weapons we have... but how is that supposed to help us against these butchers when we don't always know how to use our weapons?"

Biz keşif konvoyundanız, nesillerdir burada yaşıyoruz ve şimdiye kadar Tanrı İmparator bizi badirelere karşı korudu. Şu an savaşmak zorundayız ama. Hayatta kalanların hepsi tünelde toplandı, sahip olduğumuz silahları onlara dağıttık ancak onları nasıl kullanacağımızı bile her zaman bilemezken bu kasaplara karşı silahlarımız ne işe yarayacak ki?"
